messages.message:
Moving this thread to engg channel to have others chime in. This is a problem as the python world is not fully onto Bazel, and there are discussions on next steps here. Until we are in this state - I think at the minimum we should reconcile the package versions CI runs with those used for building service images -- to make sure we do not see surprises in the software shipped to customers.

cc @mfichman @Ashish for visibility
